chicken adobo

"Food For Thought" is a blog dedicated to sharing food related stories, and to understand what nourishment means to teenagers.

This blog contains funny, traumatic, and sentimental narratives all related to what we eat.

To me, food has always been a connection to my heritage in the sense that it made me feel close to my grandmother who is a first generation immigrant from the Filipines.

I wanted to invite other teenagers to share their stories with food and how they have made connections through food to identities and other people.

To read these stories, click the on the left side of the screen!

I hope that you enjoy (savor?) your time here, bon appetit!
